sentence: Only complaimnt was slow room service but at least they mae up for it by comping the breakfast
The room service offers a unique oriental domestic menu not so pricey and timely careful service
The bellman and the front desk clerk greeted us by name while we were there
Full marks to housekeeping for getting it service each day
Room service breakfast was 32 for two eggs meat choice and toast omelet 20 steak and eggs 29
The next morning I asked at the front desk if this group was checking out or staying another night if so I would require another room
The spa is first rate in terms of service and treatments
The situation was saved by an intelligent junior member of staff who used his own initiative and had to smuggle cups of tea to us from the hotels restaurant
What kind of staff do they hire and else do they do behind the scenes that are of disadvantage to guests
Of note the carpets are starting to look pretty worn and the chair at the desk had stains on it
Property and staff first class room super clean and very nicely appointed
The service was unparalleled especially the concierge Jenifer who was super friendly and extremely helpful
The service was impeccable in all departments

Great room restaurant service and a location that ca n’t be beatCheck in was flawless and the front desk agent went out of his way to ensure our room was ready even with an early arrival as we had to get ready for a wedding
Bret behind the front desk was also great to us and when we checked out Alex was a huge help
The front desk staff where amazing
From the hotel staff wedding coordinator hotel to the food service and valet
Though the room facilities and even the location are all impeccable it ’s truly the quintessential service you receive here that makes this the prime place to stay if you ’re in Boston
My family had a birthday holiday weekend stay at the Mandarin Oriental and from the minute we drove up we were amazed by the exceptional service
Nice and friendly staff
